title: Killers and Demons
description: Sometimes the villains win…This time the heroes don’t rise, there are no knights in shining armour, and good doesn’t triumph. It is time for the villains’ story.Craving a little blood or perhaps some horrific death? Slake your gruesome thirst for vicarious thrills with five chilling stories that go inside the twisted lives of serial killers and beyond to the dark, disturbing company of demons. Turn the pages and delve into the dark and murky world of evil.The Tales:A woman wakes up afraid, alone, and in complete darkness.A collector of hearts stalks Valentine’s Day.One man on the edge of being London’s most famous serial killer.Hell has a bounty hunter.Demon vs. knight with one soul as the prize.Killers and Demons, where the macabre murderers don’t get caught and evil triumphs.Come watch the blood drip slowly, sweetly from their fingers.
author: A.F. Stewart
